title: Moon in Cancer
summary: A tender emotional climate that prioritizes safety and connection. Feelings swell easily, and attention goes to home, belonging, and what feels protective.

meaning.headline: Emotions lean protective, nostalgic, and responsive to closeness.

frames.text: With the Moon in Cancer, moods heighten sensitivity to care and comfort.
There is a pull toward familiar people, spaces, and rituals.
Feelings may ebb and flow quickly, like tides.
Everyone will retreat or become overly sentimental.

frictions: Clinging to comfort instead of choosing what is needed
Assuming others know what will soothe you
opportunities: Checking in with loved ones or teammates
Creating cozy conditions for important work
Honoring memories or traditions that replenish

do: Reach out to someone you trust for a brief connection.
Make your space feel comforting before tackling tasks.
Let feelings move through writing, tears, or conversation.
Offer and request support with clear terms.
Plan quieter time if the day runs emotionally full.
avoid: Expecting others to intuit your needs
Replaying old hurts instead of addressing current needs

reusable_lines.text: The mood is sensitive and seeks safety and warmth today.
Gentle boundaries and care go further than force under this sky.

forbidden_claims: Predictions about family or domestic outcomes
allowed_framing: Environmental focus on tenderness and safety
Agency-based choices for soothing and boundaries

sources: Moon in Cancer as short-term climate of care
